== Volvoi (626845) ==

Volvoi is a village in the [[Ponda]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 928.62 hectares and harbouring 385 households with total population of 1842 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PONDA]] is at a distance of 17 km. Male population is 1024 and female population is 818. Scheduled Caste Population is 0 and Scheduled Tribes population is 29. Census Location Code of the village is 626845<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
